metadata.title: CVE-2019-11221 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
GPAC 0.7.1 has a buffer overflow issue in gf_import_message() inmedia_import.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-11221` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gpac - 0.5.2-426-gc5ad4e4+dfsg5-5
gpac-modules-base - 0.5.2-426-gc5ad4e4+dfsg5-5
libgpac4 - 0.5.2-426-gc5ad4e4+dfsg5-5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gpac package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.5.2-426-gc5ad4e4+dfsg5-5').
